title: Venison cottage pies
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '250g (9 oz) parsnips, peeled and cut into chunks', '25g (1 oz) butter', '5-6 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk', '½ teaspoon ground mace', 'Salt and black peppper', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 juniper berries, crushed', '500g (1 lb 2 oz) minced venison', '100g (3½ oz) small chestnut mushrooms, halved', '2 tablespoons ruby port', '200ml (7 fl oz) beef stock', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce']
